p: The content and composition of sugars in M. frivaldszkyana aerial parts are presented in Table 1. As it is evident, glucose was the prevalent sugar in the investigated plant with content of 2.77%, followed by fructose (1.18%) and galactose (0.82%). In addition, the disaccharides sucrose and melibiose were detected in the plant. Total amount of sugars was calculated to be 5499 mg/100 g.
